name: SolidityInterview
description: This set of questions shouldn't take more than 30-45 minutes to finish. [Hardhat](https://hardhat.org/getting-started/) framework is used for this repo. To test contracts run `npx hardhat test`. You can use ethers.js or web3.js to write tests. If any of the instructions are unclear, just leave a comment with your interpretation of the problem and continue to solve from there. Once complete, please create a zip folder containing all files execpt for node_modules and email to garrett@masterfile.co with your Solidity Interview - Your Name in the subject line. These problems are not meant to be challenging, but mostly to show off your thought process.
